backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata describing two UI layout fixes related to centering and layering in ValentineEnvelopeScene.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Stores prewritten summaries of key frontend files including main components, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that displays the envelope scene and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/ValentineEnvelop: Manages the envelope and card transition flow with animations, floating hearts, sparkles, and scene state handling.
frontend/src/components/ValentineMessage: Full‑screen message card with typing animation, confetti, and navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, clear, and identity management logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets theme variables, dark mode styles, base Tailwind layers, and custom Valentine-themed animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors tied to CSS variables, extended theme settings, plugins, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, requirements, known issues, and progress for the Valentine’s interactive card build.
